briefdescription.para: This function contains the working logic of the elevator array function for static release.

detaileddescription.para: Contains the logic for the static release. It contains the main logic loop for travel of elevators. The loop for placing passengers on floors and the complete flow of the program.

inbodydescription.para: A boolean array that shows if elevator needs to stop at a floor. to pick a passenger.
Array to pointer of type passenger. Stores passengers on floors.
stores the passengers from input file.
A queue of request made by passengers
